root.name: Active Cells
root.description: This plug-in implements fast active contours for image segmentation. Their representation in terms of spline curves allows for a natural and intiutive manipulation of the active contour through control points.
root.author: big - Biomedical Imaging Group
root.changelog:
- Version 2.7.0.0 Date 2015-05-24 18:57:15
- Fixed bug to access snake ROIs from outside of the plugin - Included methods for subdivision - JFileChooser is now threadsafe - Saving/loading operations conserve the last used path
- Version 2.6.0.0 Date 2015-02-11 23:42:43
- Fixed multiple bugs related to the compatibility with Protocols - Fixed bug in the GUI - Modified deprecated methods from icy
- Version 2.4.0.0 Date 2014-12-08 23:27:21
Expanded the options on shape-priors
- Version 2.3.0.0 Date 2014-05-03 01:33:43
Adapted to VTK6
- Version 2.2.0.0 Date 2014-04-01 23:23:18
Minor changes (out of beta)
- Version 2.1.0.1b Date 2014-02-09 20:01:46
- Version 2.1.0.0 Date 2013-12-04 12:08:58
- Fixed bug with threading - Performance improvements - Snakes stay as ROIs in the image when the plugin is closed
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2013-11-13 17:31:27
- Support to save snakes - Support to load snakes - Support to load arbitrary prior shapes. These shapes can come from saved snakes using the Active Cells plugin, or arbitrary spline curves coming from the new Shape Designer plugin.
- Version 1.9.0.0 Date 2013-11-11 14:34:33
Implemented loading/saving of snakes
- Version 1.7.0.1 Date 2013-10-30 19:50:54
Minor code changes
- Version 1.7.0.0 Date 2013-10-30 17:43:55
- Modifications to comply with icy 1.4.0.0
- Version 1.5.0.3 Date 2013-10-24 17:00:27
Rolled back to Java 6
- Version 1.5.0.2 Date 2013-10-22 15:41:10
Refactored dependencies
- Version 1.5.0.1 Date 2013-09-12 13:11:08
- Minor improvements
- Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2013-05-28 09:16:33
- Fixed bug in copy/paste operation. - Modified the help website. - Corrected deprecated icy methods. - Updated javadoc.
- Version 1.4.3.0 Date 2013-04-26 10:30:42
Code reorganization. Some classes have been moved to the SDK.
- Version 1.4.2.0 Date 2013-04-16 19:19:02
IMPROVEMENTS - Modified the sampling scheme of the snake such that the computational load does not depend on the number of control points.
MODIFICATIONS - The method for resampling polygons has been moved to the Active Cells Framework.
- Version 1.4.0.1 Date 2013-04-11 11:37:46
- Rolled back to comply with the release branch of Icy
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2013-04-11 10:47:17
- Updated javadoc style - Corrected deprecated methods.
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2012-11-01 16:25:08
Removed the shell in the display for the region and mixture energies.
- Version 1.2.0.2 Date 2012-10-23 15:41:55
Updated javadoc
- Version 1.2.0.1 Date 2012-10-22 15:30:34
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2012-10-16 17:17:27
Various GUI improvements
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-09-26 17:28:02
Added labels to identify the active cells
- Version 1.0.0.11 Date 2012-09-18 12:31:14
Fixed all the issues with the icons.
- Version 1.0.0.10 Date 2012-09-18 12:17:44
- Version 1.0.0.9 Date 2012-09-18 12:13:27
- Version 1.0.0.8 Date 2012-09-18 12:05:36
- Version 1.0.0.7 Date 2012-09-18 12:05:21
- Version 1.0.0.6 Date 2012-09-18 12:01:56
Solved the icon issue
- Version 1.0.0.5 Date 2012-09-18 10:53:11
- Version 1.0.0.4 Date 2012-09-18 09:55:45
- Version 1.0.0.3 Date 2012-09-18 09:53:22
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2012-09-18 09:49:54
Different handling of the icons
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2012-09-17 12:04:13
Changed the cursors
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2012-09-16 16:38:54
Initial submit
